channel.title: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
channel.description: Hello all, i am interested in creating my very own server. I need a blank client-- any ideas on which one? How do i start from scratch and make shops, items, npcs, etc. I have just started, and im interested in coding and making a server, yet i have no clue how. Can someone post beginner links on how to do everything? Thank you soo much! :)

item.title: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

what pkpoison said. A 317 is very very easy to code. Muck around with it for a while till your server is uber awsomeness. Then mabye move on. I don’t recommend a 508+ for a beginner because it’s alot different.

Read full topic
item.source: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!

item.title: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Well if you want a blank client I suggestion a 317 deob, heres the link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392539.0.html

And for a blank source I would suggestion Final Devolution 2.7 its not blank it has perfect combat and needs a little work done but if you want to start out on a finished source with a lot of bugs then you would want to go to DeltaScape your choice buddy, depends what type of server you’re looking to make.

Read full topic
item.source: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
